name: Goblin Ambush
description: A band of goblins ambushes the party on a forest road
tactics: Goblins hide and attack with surprise. Boss stays back with shortbow.

name: Highwayman Holdup
description: Bandits demand a toll on the road
tactics: Captain negotiates, bandits surround. May flee if half are downed.

name: Wolf Pack Hunt
description: A pack of wolves stalks the party at dusk
tactics: Wolves use Pack Tactics. Target isolated party members.

name: Crypt Defenders
description: Skeletons rise from stone sarcophagi as intruders enter
tactics: Skeletons form a line and attack nearest living creature.
treasureHint: Hoard CR 0-4 in the central sarcophagus

name: Bridge Troll... er, Ogre
description: An ogre blocks a narrow bridge and demands payment
tactics: Ogre tries to grapple and throw enemies off the bridge.

name: Owlbear Den
description: The party stumbles upon an owlbear's nesting ground
tactics: Owlbear is aggressive and territorial. Fights to the death defending nest.

name: Bugbear Scouts
description: Bugbear scouts in a cave entrance
tactics: Bugbears use Surprise Attack from shadows. One flees to warn others.

name: Zombie Horde
description: A shambling horde of zombies emerges from the mist
tactics: Zombies move toward nearest living creature. Use mob rules for large groups.

name: Manticore Attack
description: A manticore swoops down on the party from a clifftop perch
tactics: Stays airborne, uses tail spikes. Lands for melee when spikes depleted.
treasureHint: Hoard CR 5-10 in its cliff nest

name: Troll's Cave
description: A troll lurks in a damp cave littered with bones
tactics: Troll regenerates. Players must use fire or acid. Fights until killed.

name: Cult Ritual
description: Cultists performing a dark ritual in a hidden chamber
tactics: Fanatics cast spells while cultists shield them. Ritual may summon something if not stopped.

name: The Hag's Cottage
description: A green hag in her swamp cottage lures victims with illusions
tactics: Uses Illusory Appearance and Invisible Passage. Fights dirty.

name: Hill Giant Raid
description: A hill giant and its orc lackeys raid a farmstead
tactics: Giant throws rocks from distance, orcs charge. Giant flees at half HP.

name: Young Green Dragon's Ambush
description: A young green dragon lurks in a dense, misty forest
tactics: Uses breath weapon first, then guerrilla hit-and-run with flight and forest cover.
treasureHint: Hoard CR 5-10 in its forest lair

name: Vampire Spawn Attack
description: Vampire spawn attack the party at night
tactics: Spawn use Spider Climb to attack from above. Flee from radiant damage/sunlight.

name: Mind Flayer Ambush
description: A mind flayer and its thralls emerge from the Underdark
tactics: Mind Blast first, then Extract Brain on stunned targets. Grimlocks swarm.

name: Beholder's Sanctum
description: A beholder lurks in its vertical lair, eye rays at the ready
tactics: Antimagic Cone on casters, eye rays on fighters. Uses lair actions. Paranoid and strategic.
treasureHint: Hoard CR 11-16 in the central chamber

name: The Lich's Tower
description: A lich awaits challengers in its tower sanctum
tactics: Legendary actions, lair actions. Opens with Power Word Kill or Finger of Death. Phylactery hidden elsewhere.
treasureHint: Hoard CR 17+ in the tower vault

name: Dragon's Lair: Adult Red Dragon
description: An adult red dragon defends its volcanic mountain lair
tactics: Uses lair actions. Opens with breath weapon from flight. Legendary actions between turns.

name: Sewer Infestation
description: Giant rats infest the city sewers
tactics: Rats attack in waves. Swarms engulf weakest-looking characters.
treasureHint: Trinkets and coins in the muck

name: Harpy Nest
description: Harpies nest on a rocky outcropping and lure travelers with song
tactics: Use Luring Song to pull victims to cliffsides, then attack.

name: Mimic Chest
description: What appears to be a treasure chest is actually a mimic
tactics: Waits for a character to touch it, then uses Adhesive and Bite.

name: Basilisk Cave
description: A basilisk lurks in a cave full of eerily lifelike statues
tactics: Uses Petrifying Gaze. Statues are former victims that could be restored.

name: Wyvern Assault
description: A wyvern dives from the sky onto the party
tactics: Dive attacks with Stinger. Grabs smaller targets and drops them.

name: Drow Patrol
description: A drow patrol intercepts trespassers in the Underdark
tactics: Use Darkness and hand crossbow poison. Elite warrior engages strongest foe.

name: Elemental Forge
description: A fire elemental guards an ancient dwarven forge
tactics: Elemental moves through enemies to ignite. Mephits harass from range.

name: Frost Giant Mountain Pass
description: A frost giant blocks a frozen mountain pass
tactics: Giant hurls rocks while wolves flank. Avalanche risk (environmental hazard).

name: Aboleth's Pool
description: An aboleth lurks in a subterranean pool, enslaving minds
tactics: Uses Enslave on melee attackers. Lair actions each round. Retreats into water if losing.
treasureHint: Hoard CR 5-10 in the pool depths

name: Kraken Attack at Sea
description: A kraken surfaces beneath the party's ship
tactics: Tentacle attacks to grapple and drag overboard. Lightning Storm lair action.

name: Slaad Incursion
description: A rift to Limbo spills chaos into the world as slaadi emerge
tactics: Green Slaad shapeshifts to ambush. Red Slaadi implant eggs via claw attacks. Tadpoles swarm the weakest.
treasureHint: Limbo crystals worth 500gp scattered near the rift

name: Sphinx's Riddle Gate
description: A sphinx guards a temple entrance and poses a deadly riddle
tactics: Poses riddles first. Attacks only if threatened or riddle failed. Uses Lair Actions and legendary actions.

name: Myconid Grove
description: A myconid colony defends its fungal grove from intruders
tactics: Sovereign uses rapport spores to communicate. Colony attacks only if provoked. Gas spores nearby may detonate.

name: Sahuagin Coastal Raid
description: Sahuagin raiders emerge from the surf to attack a coastal village
tactics: Warriors attack in waves while priest casts from the shallows. All retreat to water if losing.

name: Githyanki Raiding Party
description: Githyanki warriors descend from the Astral Plane on a raiding mission
tactics: Knight commands warriors. All use silver greatswords. May retreat to Astral Plane if outmatched.
treasureHint: Silver greatswords and astral navigation charts

name: Treant's Awakening
description: A treant awakens trees to defend an ancient grove from despoilers
tactics: Treant animates trees. Dryads charm attackers. Fight only to protect the grove.
treasureHint: Ancient druidic artifacts hidden in tree hollows

name: Cyclops Den
description: A pair of cyclopes block a mountain pass, hurling boulders
tactics: Hurl rocks from elevated positions. Engage in melee if enemies close distance.

name: Yuan-ti Temple
description: Yuan-ti conduct a sinister ritual in a hidden jungle temple
tactics: Infiltrators disguise as humans. Malisons use Suggestion and snake form. Protect the ritual at all costs.
treasureHint: Serpentine idol worth 750gp plus ritual components

name: Hobgoblin Warband
description: A disciplined hobgoblin warband marches through contested territory
tactics: Martial Advantage on flanked targets. Captain directs formation. Worgs scout and flank.
treasureHint: Military supplies and a battle standard

name: Elemental Nexus
description: A convergence of elemental planes creates a chaotic battlefield
tactics: Each elemental uses its terrain advantage. Fire ignites, Air throws, Earth grapples, Water engulfs.
treasureHint: Elemental gems form at the nexus center
